opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: City of Chicago v. Environmental Defense Fund

opinion:
510 U.S. 1008

City of Chicago et al.
v.
Environmental Defense Fund et al.

No. 92-1639.

Supreme Court of United States.

December 6, 1993.

1

Appeal from the C. A. 7th Cir. [Certiorari granted, 509 U. S. 903.]

2

Motion of respondents for reconsideration of the Solicitor General's motion for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument [ante, p. 961] denied.
